channel.title: A few questions for you
channel.description:
ok im fairly new to moparscape, and havent used it much beccause i dont nderstand most of it
1: how do i join a server with others in?, can i see them? 2: most servers i choose dont work, at the moment the top server is devon.com (ip adress) and it wont work
3:how do i spawn an npc nearby?, i tried spawning the kaphite queen but nothing happened.
4:why arnt runes stacked?
NOTE: the rune claws cant be put in your bank, it just says XXXX not supported
thanks for your time.

item.title: A few questions for you
item.dc:creator: @danny89 danny89
item.description:
@danny89 wrote:

ok 1. Some servers need hamachi and you can download it at www.hamachi.cc and you can find server on the advertisment page.
2. They may be down or need hamachi
3. On some servers you need to change your rights then you put ::npc #(id for monster), To change you rights on your own server go into your char. file and open your acc. and change your rights to 3 for owner/co-owner 2 for admin and 1 for mod
4. N/A
and rune claws with a bunch of other items do that and I donâ€™t know how to fix it.
I hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions for you
item.dc:creator: @Bullstriker Bullstriker
item.description:
@Bullstriker wrote:

  1. Moparscape.org then go to server list.
  2. Most likey have the wrong port. (File -> new port)
  3. To do that manually goto autospawn.cfg and add it in. (need a tutorial if a newbie)
  4. You using wrong ID, as in when you look up fire runes they will have 5 different IDs used for different things. When you have a choice use the lowest number ID. For Fire runes it will be 554 if you look it up.
    Rune claws: most likely have no script to go with it sence they are not used that much programmers can get lazzy.

Peace

Read full topic
